amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce funds for Defense Nuclear Non-Proliferation by $125 million and to increase funds for Defense Environmental clean up by a similar amount.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to reduce funds for Defense Nuclear Non-Proliferation by $125 million and increase funds for Environmental and other Defense activities, Defense Environmental clean up by the same amount.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Garamendi amendment (A033) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by : Amendment (A033) offered by Mr. Garamendi.
